title: How to use old client?
body: Someone please tell me how to use the old client, this new client is just pure crap. I thought some of the things RIOT did was crap, but this is an all time high for them. It lags, it is super slow and you almost always disconnect when entering a game. Whoever came up with this at RIOT should be fired as of yesterday.

replies.body:
You can access the Legacy Client at any time from the login screen:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if you have any questions.
